title: Spiders: aggression and mating
brief_description: Features the aggressive characteristics of the spider, showing how webs are used to trap prey. Shows how male and female must suspend aggressive behaviour in order to mate.
description: Features the aggressive characteristics of the spider, showing how webs are used to trap prey. Shows how male and female must suspend aggressive behaviour in order to mate.
